Text:
i only do 1080p on animes i like, I didnt use flac because the source is only 2.0 instead of 5.1.

the significant difference between 720p and 1080p is mostly color. in 720p you lose around 10-15% of the natural color from 1080p not really a big difference but since i like this anime i went for 1080p

@Daman, yeah makes sense, it is your hard work going into these so why not go the better quality for a fav anime.

You do a lot of funi's anime (which I like since everything not funi is easily obtainable elsewhere) but any chance on a Needless upload at any point?
I also dig the Funimation uploads, So far I've downloaded most of the anime series you've uploaded ^_^ so thank you for the effort you work on these!

If you see me comment; you know that the Anime series in particular is of high quality. Thanks, Daman!

To everyone else, this is entirely worth the quality.

Is there more episodes to be released soon, Daman?
No date is scheduled for Collection Part 2.

Cheers, Daman.

Every aspect of this series is 10/10 for those who are doubtful. Daman is renowned for giving you the best quality at the lowest possible file size. 

Also, it seems they're finally releasing the second part of Fate/Zero on Blu-Ray, sweet!

http://www.crunchyroll.com/anime-news/2012/09/14-1/video-fatezero-einzbern-consultation-room-2-preview
Hey, really looking forward to watching this.  However, I downloaded it and all I get is a green screen and the sound.  Am using VLC, help anyone? Thanks
Tfw, Download the latest VLC or K-lite Codecs, The videos are in 10bit, You need a 10bit supported PLayer
@Daman. Yeah I got it.  Thanks for the upload, was fantastic! Still no news on Part 2?

Daman, will you be uploading Steins;Gate soon by any chance?

It just released today in English dub: episodes 1-12. Very good anime, that's well worth the watch if you haven't seen it yet.
yes, i will uploading steins gate as soon as i get my hands on the DVds/blu rays
